definition: line of business/industry/occupation/job/employment/school studies/enterprise/property/(Buddhism) karma/deed/to engage in/already
student graduating in the current year/recent graduate

sentences.english: The Browns are all college graduates.
sentences.chinese: 布朗一家人都是大學畢業生。

sentences.english: The leader had joined the army much earlier after graduating from high school.
sentences.chinese: 這位班長自打高中畢業後就入伍了。

sentences.english: He graduated from Xi'an international university , the Department of Foreign Languages English majors.
sentences.chinese: 畢業於西安外事學院，外語系英語專業。

sentences.english: I was a graduate of Guangzhou Vocational Middle School of Tourism.
sentences.chinese: 我是廣州旅遊職業中學畢業生。

sentences.english: I will graduate from eking University this July. I have majored in accounting.
sentences.chinese: 今年七月將從北京大學畢業，我主修的專業是會計學。

sentences.english: One of the girls she rescued from a pimp later graduated from high school as valedictorian.
sentences.chinese: 其中一個她所救的女孩之後在高中畢業典禮上致辭。

sentences.english: I also worked at an insurance company for my graduate field work.
sentences.chinese: 並且我在一家保險公司進行了我的畢業設計。

sentences.english: By 12th grade, they graduated from high school.
sentences.chinese: 到了12年級，他們從高中畢業了。

sentences.english: Thus, we can see some installation works made by graduates from the sculpture department.
sentences.chinese: 所以在雕塑系畢業生的作品中也能看到部分裝置作品。

sentences.english: Shanxi College graduate, deputy chief physician.
sentences.chinese: 山西中醫學院畢業，副主任醫師。

sentences.english: I wondered if this was really what post-collegiate life was supposed to be like.
sentences.chinese: 我不知道是否大學畢業後的生活就真是這個樣子。

sentences.english: My biological mother was a young unwed college graduate student and she decided to put me up for adoption.
sentences.chinese: 我的親生母親是一個年輕的沒有結匯棠大學畢業生。

sentences.english: Many students want to work in a blue-chip company after their graduation.
sentences.chinese: 許多學生畢業後想在藍籌公司工作。

sentences.english: After he graduated, he joined the army and devoted himself to making his motherland safe.
sentences.chinese: 畢業之後他參加了部隊，獻身於保衛祖國。

sentences.english: She will give a touching valediction at graduation.
sentences.chinese: 她將在畢業典禮作感人的告別演講。

sentences.english: Fudan University students at their graduation ceremony in Shanghai last month.
sentences.chinese: 上海復旦學子於畢上月畢業禮。

definition: the Great Learning, one of the Four Books 四書|四书[Si4 shu1] in Confucianism
to read a book/to study/to attend school
specialty/specialized field/main field of study (at university)/major/CL:門|门[men2],個|个[ge4]/professional
to go to school/to attend school
to return to one's home country
master's degree/person who has a master's degree/learned person
to read/to study/reading of word (i.e. pronunciation), similar to 拼音[pin1 yin1]
foundation of a University or College/school opening/the start of a new term
